job.title: Cloud Engineer
job.description: P.S. Kindly apply only if you are ELIGIBLE to work in Canada. We do not provide sponsorship/ Visa services.The Cloud Engineer may be responsible for but is not limited to;Programming experience in one or more programming languages (Java, C/C++, C#, Objective C, Python, JavaScript).Development experience including experience with new DevOps tools and methods AND/OR Agile Development.Experience with one or more Infrastructure as Code tools such as Cloud Formation, Deployment Manager, Terraform, AnsibleExperience in software systems design, with experience in architecting distributed systemsExperience in architecting, developing and/or maintaining production-grade systemsExperience in virtualization, multi-tenant cloud infrastructures, storage systems and content delivery networksStrong development experience and delivery history in key scripting languages (Ruby, Python, Powershell, Groovy) or another common programming languageProven experience with a cloud provider (AWS, Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure)
